attributes.description:
The SQ5 may look like may look similar to the normal Q5 but under the bonnet lives a 3.0TDI BiTurbo V6 monster that pushes out 230kW and a MASSIVE 650nM of torque. That means 0-100 in 5.1 seconds from a diesel! It isn’t all performance though, the SQ5 is firm but comfortable, quiet and well equipped. A great choice for running the kids to school or munching the miles between cities. 
ENQUIRE NOW - 021 556 5494 - sales@cars4africa.co.za - 49 Blaauwberg Road, Table View - We’ll take care of everything while you sit back & enjoy the ride!
